name: Explore the most historical city of (I)Stambul...
description: Firstly, with me U will have a lots of memories and lots of  fun  .... Ur days and nights will be colorful and full of crazy stuffs we'll  do  together...Secondly, I am athletic and i don;t get tired quickly and i am capable of most sports (football, basketball, volleyball and i also have my Long board:) i can give it for a ride :) ,Or  we can try something that we both haven;t tried in our lives (eXtreme things) .briefly i  don;t have  limits :) ...Finally, I am good in science, basically, i am chemistry guy and i know 4 languages so we may also discuss about sth that u may like concerning or not concerning them. So I  hope we  will meet very soon.. Take care
